alert.note: Alert for Camden; Dent; Laclede; Phelps; Pulaski (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 08 at 6:56PM CDT until May 08 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Dent County in south central Missouri... Northeastern Laclede County in southwestern Missouri... Pulaski County in central Missouri... Phelps County in east central Missouri... Southeastern Camden County in central Missouri... * Until 745 PM CDT. * At 656 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles northwest of Richland to near Crocker to 8 miles southeast of Rolla, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Rolla, Fort Leonard Wood, Salem, Waynesville, St. Robert, Richland, Crocker, Doolittle, Newburg, Edgar Springs, Stoutland, Lenox, Beulah, Lake Spring, Anutt, Bangert, Laquey, Ozark Springs, Devil`s Elbow and Howes. This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 138 and 169, and between mile markers 171 and 185. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
